metadata.name: The Beauty of Pride - Adila
metadata.description: Adila is a woman from Afghanistan. Since she was little she had to grow up in a world controlled by powerful men who did not let her advance. She has had to build her life from scratch. Now with pride, Adila can say that she is a very strong woman. When she was 20 years old, she and her parents were able to move to Canada. Now, Adila has 2 children who are very proud of their mother.
